privacy_meta_desc: Learn how OneForMind protects your data, privacy, and ensures your security.
privacy_meta_og_desc: We believe your habits and finances are your own business. Read our privacy policy.
privacy_subtitle: We build tools to help you take control of your life, not to exploit your personal information. Transparency is our default.
privacy_tldr_1_desc: We never sell your personal information or financial data to third parties.
privacy_tldr_2_desc: You own your data. You can export or permanently delete your account at any time.
privacy_tldr_3_desc: Your financial records and habits are encrypted in transit and at rest.
privacy_tldr_4_desc: We only use essential cookies to keep you logged in and functional analytics.
privacy_doc_intro: This Privacy Policy describes how OneForMind ("we", "us", or "our") collects, uses, and shares your personal information when you use our web application, tools, and services.
privacy_p_collection: We believe in data minimization. We only collect what is strictly necessary to make the app work for you.
privacy_li_collection_1_desc: Name, email address, and authentication credentials (if not using Google OAuth).
privacy_li_collection_2_desc: Habit logs, financial entries, journal notes, and planner tasks.
privacy_li_collection_2_strong: This data is strictly private to your account.
privacy_li_collection_3_desc: Basic analytics such as IP address, browser type, and operating system to help us debug errors.
privacy_p_usage: Your data is used exclusively to provide and improve the OneForMind experience. Specifically, we use it to:
privacy_li_usage_1: Provide you with the core functionalities (habit tracking, financial insights, task management).
privacy_li_usage_2: Send you important account notifications (e.g., password resets).
privacy_li_usage_3: Analyze anonymous, aggregated usage patterns to improve our UI/UX.
privacy_finance_note_desc: We are not a bank. We do not connect directly to your bank accounts. All financial data is manually inputted by you and is used solely to generate personal insights.
privacy_p_security: We implement standard industry practices to protect your data. Our databases are secured, and we enforce HTTPS/SSL for all communications. Passwords are securely hashed using modern cryptographic algorithms.
privacy_p_cookies: OneForMind uses "cookies" to remember your session and preferences (like Dark mode). We do not use intrusive third-party advertising trackers on our dashboard.
privacy_p_rights: Depending on your location, you have the right to:
privacy_li_rights_1: Access the personal information we hold about you.
privacy_li_rights_2: Request the correction of inaccurate data.
privacy_li_rights_3: Request the permanent deletion of your account and all associated data.
privacy_p_contact: If you have any questions or data deletion requests, please reach out to us:
privacy_contact_sla: We typically respond within 24-48 business hours.
privacy_export_desc: We don't hold your data hostage. You can download a complete backup of your habits, finances, and journals anytime.
privacy_faq_1_q: Can your team read my private journal entries?
privacy_faq_1_a: No. We have strict internal access controls. Unless you explicitly share an error log with our support team, your user-generated content remains entirely private.
privacy_faq_2_q: Do you sell my data to advertisers?
privacy_faq_2_a: Absolutely not. Our business model is based on providing a great productivity tool, not acting as a data broker.
privacy_faq_3_q: How do I delete my account?
privacy_faq_3_a: You can delete your account permanently directly from your Profile Settings inside the dashboard. This action will wipe all your data from our servers.
privacy_cta_desc: Join thousands of users who trust OneForMind for their daily productivity.
terms_meta_desc: Read the rules regarding the use of OneForMind. Clear, transparent, and fair terms of service.
terms_meta_og_desc: The agreement between you and OneForMind.

terms_intro_sub: Please read them carefully. By accessing or using our Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, then you may not access the Service.
terms_p_eligibility: Our services are not for everyone. To maintain a safe and legal environment, you must meet the following criteria:
terms_eligibility_1: Must be at least 13 years old
terms_p_rules: We encourage productivity, not chaos. When using OneForMind, you agree to play by the rules.
terms_rules_do_1: Use the app to track your own habits and finances.
terms_rules_do_3: Export your data regularly for backups.
terms_rules_dont_1: Attempt to hack or reverse engineer the API.
terms_rules_dont_2: Use the service for illegal activities.
terms_rules_dont_3: Share your account with multiple people.
terms_p_payment: Some features of OneForMind are billed on a subscription basis ('Subscription(s)'). You will be billed in advance on a recurring and periodic basis.
terms_li_payment_1_desc: You may be required to enter your billing information to sign up for the Free Trial.
terms_li_payment_2_desc: Certain refund requests for Subscriptions may be considered by OneForMind on a case-by-case basis.
terms_p_termination: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.
terms_legal_caps: IN NO EVENT SHALL ONEFORMIND, NOR ITS DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, PARTNERS, AGENTS, SUPPLIERS, OR AFFILIATES, BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES.

terms_cta_note: Clicking 'I Decline' will return you to the home page.
